name: North Route
notes: Lower patrol density; higher plate reader density near I-90; vary time windows.

name: Central Route
notes: Heavy traffic concealment; watch for DOT blitzes; rotate days/stops.

name: Southern Toll Route
notes: High camera/toll logging; use for overt runs; avoid for stealth.

name: Hybrid Central–South
notes: Blend highways to break patterns; avoid overusing US-22.
